wikipedia_page.main: Major Francis Edward Henry Farquharson VC (25 March 1837 – 12 September 1875) was a Scottish recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: *Francis Farquharson – recipient of the Victoria Cross
* 25 March – Francis Farquharson, soldier, recipient of the Victoria Cross (died 1875 in England)
